mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum AS rnum FROM ( SELECT re_no , re_category , re_parent_no , re_mem_id , re_content , re_ip , re_reg_date , re_mod_date , m.mem_name AS re_mem_name FROM reply r, member m WHERE re_category=#{reCategory} AND re_parent_no=#{reParentNo} AND r.re_mem_id=m.mem_id ORDER BY re_no desc ) a ) b WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{paging.firstRow} AND #{paging.lastRow}
